item.title: I absolutely love all these games, but they were never my *perfect game... so I am building my own! check out the link in bio for all social links & discord #global #citybuilder #gamedev #indiegames #strategygames #game #coding #gamedesign #citiesskylines

item.title: but for real, it's really hard to say. there is a lot more to be developed before I can get a grasp of how much I need to ask to cover costs, and to know what will be a fair price. but I do have all of you in mind and want to make things as accessible as

item.title: it's all about procedural generation baby!! the amount of trees is measured in Trillions! that's 12 zeros. would you like more technical videos about what makes my game work? #citybuilder #gamedev #indiegames #strategygames #game #gamedesign #coding #proc

item.title: it makes the game world, and your town feel so much more unique! I wonder why not more games let you be more creative with your buildings. do you know of other games? #coding #gamedesign #game #strategygames #indiegames #gamedev #citybuilder #citiesskylin

item.title: it has been exactly one year now since I started working on this global city building game I have been wanting to make since forever. a lot of things left to do, but I love to see what has been achieved in this past year. thank you all for your enthusiasm
item.description: it has been exactly one year now since I started working on this global city building game I have been wanting to make since forever. a lot of things left to do, but I love to see what has been achieved in this past year. thank you all for your enthusiasm

item.title: Manor Lords has released! I played it as soon as I could and it really is lovely. it has a lot of great mechanics to learn from üî• have you played it already? #steam #gamedev #indiegames #strategygames #game #citybuilder
